Name: Algeria
Ingredients: 50 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
15 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Pisco, apricot and orange combine harmoniously in this medium-dry, balanced cocktail with a tangy bite.
History: This cocktail was served in the 1960s at Joseph Baum's La Fonda Del Sol restaurant in New York City and may have been created there.
Nutrition: One serving of Algeria contains 159 calories
